key = 675767058
FLAG{H3ll_W1nd0wS}



notflag = b'NotFLAG{Windows_15_S0_GREAT_15NT_IT?}'
nums = [
0x2847631A, 0x28476335, 0x28476347, 0x28476313, 0x28476349, 0x2847631B, 0x28476386, 0x28476329,
0x2847634D, 0x28476348, 0x2847634B, 0x28476367, 0x28476313, 0x28476325, 0x28476355, 0x2847633A,

]
[z-(x^y) for x,y,z in zip(notflag,b'FLAG',nums)]  # all same => key
